title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build multi-modal AI agents with Strands Agents and Amazon S3 Vectors (DEV332)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Strands Agents 和 Amazon S3 Vectors 构建多模态 AI 代理 (DEV332)
abstract: The open-source Strands Agents SDK enables building production-ready, multi-agent AI systems in a few lines of code. The session demonstrates creating custom tools for video content analysis and converting them into Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers. Live code examples show how to implement scalable chat memory with Amazon S3 Vectors, from local development to enterprise production. Developers will learn how agents maintain context across conversations and provide personalized responses through efficient memory storage and retrieval.
abstract_cn: 开源的 Strands Agents SDK 能够用几行代码构建生产就绪的多智能体 AI 系统。该会议演示了如何创建用于视频内容分析的自定义工具，并将其转换为模型上下文协议 (MCP) 服务器。实时代码示例展示了如何使用 Amazon S3 Vectors 实现可扩展的聊天记忆，从本地开发到企业生产环境。开发人员将学习智能体如何通过高效的记忆存储和检索在对话中保持上下文并提供个性化响应。
